DOC.brief_summary: Ulinastatin reduce systemic inflammatory response protects organs ischemia/reperfusion-induced injury . The aim study evaluate effect ulinastatin postoperative renal function patient undergo robot-assisted laparoscopic partial nephrectomy . Seventy patient , age 20 79 year , schedule robot-assisted laparoscopic partial nephrectomy divide ulinastatin ( n=35 ) control ( n=35 ) group . Randomly select patient ulinastatin group give ulinastatin . In contrast , patient control group receive equivalent volume normal saline placebo . The primary endpoint postoperative renal function measure serum creatinine , cystatin C , urine output .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Ulinastatin Postoperative Renal Function Patients Undergoing Robot-assisted Laparoscopic Partial Nephrectomy
DOC.criteria: patient schedule undergo robotassisted laparoscopic partial nephrectomy American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) physical status IIII Subjects ineligible severe respiratory cardiovascular disease , renal insufficiency operation , cognitive dysfunction , unable communicate speak Korean
